content: excess water without twisting the fabric lay on a flat surface to block and dry notes on sizing and alterations if you prefer to work socks cuff down you can easily modify this pattern keep in mind that you may not be able to choose the position of the last purl v near your toe if you would like to change the total stitch count for this pattern you will need your total stitch count to be an even number that when divided by two is an odd number for example 62 works because 62/2 = 31 odd number 64 does not work because 64/2 = 32 even number >>> flying north © 2015 maria montzka/stitched in sweden - all rights reserved 5
